#Mahindra has passed on the GST benefits to customers from September 6 onwards and here are the savings you’ll get when getting home a new Mahindra. https://t.co/jlR1vHWW1j

#MAHINDRA & MAHINDRA

📌 Price Revision (effective Sept 6, 2025)
Co. announces GST benefits for customers across its ICE portfolio.
Benefits up to ₹1.56 lakh offered

🚙 Model-wise Highlights
Thar / Thar ROXX: Benefits between ₹1.1 – 1.3 lakh
XUV700: Benefits up to ₹1.43 lakh

@honeyfnoguy @REDBOXINDIA Mahindra price cuts effective Sep 6, 2025, due to GST changes. Current (before) ex-showroom ranges in Lakh, max cut in ₹k (varies by variant):

XUV3XO: 7.99-15.80, 156
Thar: 11.50-17.62, 135
Thar Roxx: 12.99-23.39, 133
Scorpio: 13.77-17.72, 101
Scorpio N: 13.99-25.15, 145
